The BEST game if u want to ruin your life n' nervous system .. by discovering new game mechanics like spinnin' dudes that one shots you or some MCU dudes with powers to see through the wall .. Not to mention the 5IQ 13yo Russian guys that screams like there will be no tomorrow.

So yea .. 110 % recommended. But if your PC can handle something else .. go play it and uninstall this ! :)
